parameters.content:
# MVP APP ROADMAP
## 2# MVP FEATURES (Back-end)

Comprehensive feature roadmap organized by category.
Each feature box links to actual workflow implementations.

**Status Legend:**
🟢 Completed | 🟡 In Progress | 🔴 Blocked/Issues

**Last Updated:** October 15, 2025
# 2. SOCIAL MEDIA FEATURES
# 3. TRAVEL FEATURES

## Trip Adviser

**Description:**
Provides personalized travel recommendations based on user preferences and destination. Integrates with TripAdvisor API to fetch attractions and restaurants.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Accommodation Finder

**Description:**
Searches and compares hotel options across multiple platforms (Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, Agoda) with pricing and availability in multiple currencies.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Booking Automation

**Description:**
Processes hotel booking requests, extracts details using AI (hotel name, guest info, preferences), checks for missing information, and generates booking links for platforms like Booking.com, Expedia, and Agoda with personalized booking instructions.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Flight Finder

**Description:**
Searches for flights based on origin, destination, dates, and passenger preferences. Provides comprehensive flight options with pricing and booking links.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Smart Trip Planner (Calendar Integration)

**Description:**
Automatically adds flights, accommodations, and daily activities to the user's Google Calendar for seamless trip organization.

**Status:**🔴 Not Started

## Budget & Cost Estimator

**Description:**
Estimates travel costs based on destination, duration, travel style, and provides budget breakdowns by category (flights, accommodation, food, activities).

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started

## Smart Packing List

**Description:**
Uses destination & dates to fetch weather (OpenWeather API), then GPT suggests climate-aware packing checklist. List is editable and re-syncs on forecast change.

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started
# 4. SHOPPING FEATURES

## Product Finder

**Description:**
Searches across multiple retailers (Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping) to find products based on user queries with AI-powered product matching and brand detection.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Multi-Store Price Comparison

**Description:**
Compares prices across Amazon, eBay, and other platforms. Provides best deals, price statistics, store comparisons, and smart recommendations with affiliate earnings tracking.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Style/Design Visual Match Finder

**Description:**
Uses GPT-4 Vision and image recognition to find similar products based on uploaded photos. Includes region-aware retailer intelligence and smart intent analysis.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Grocery List Generator

**Description:**
Generates organized grocery lists from recipes with smart categorization (Meat, Dairy, Produce, Pantry, Frozen), measurement conversions, and filtering based on user's pantry items.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
# 5. FINANCIAL FEATURES

## Expense Categoriser

**Description:**
Every transaction and email receipt is auto-sorted using N26-inspired rules (Groceries, Utilities, SaaS, Travel, Dining, Entertainment, etc.). Reports & budgets are accurate without manual tagging—huge time saver with fewer "uncategorized" items.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Budget + Overspend Alerts

**Description:**
Budgets per category (or overall) with early warnings—e.g., "Dining is at 83% and it's only the 20th." Users avoid end-of-month surprises and get gentle nudges to stay on track with MCP integration for AI-powered alerts.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Spending Habits Reports

**Description:**
Weekly/monthly roll-ups of spend by category, merchant, and trend vs. last period. Shows patterns like "You spent 40% more on dining this month" with visual charts and habit change analysis.

**Triggers:** Schedule (weekly/monthly)
**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Cash Flow Calendar

**Description:**
Calendar view of all expected ins/outs with daily net position and balance projections. Nightly build/update from recurring income, bills/subscriptions (amount + cadence + next date), and known one-offs. Color-coded events (red warnings, yellow bills, green income).

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Bill & Subscriptions Tracker

**Description:**
Builds a live ledger of recurring charges and warns users before renewals or price hikes. Tracks due dates, amounts, categories with automatic status updates and reminder alerts.

**Status:** 🟡 In Progress

## Invoice Auto-Generator

**Description:**
Automatically extracts invoice data from PDFs or text using AI parsing (GPT-4o-mini). Smart validation, European number format support, multi-chunk processing, field deduplication, and quality scoring.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed

## Goal Savings Tracker

**Description:**
Tracks progress to user goals (amount + deadline) and recommends contributions. Shows progress percentage, calculates required monthly savings, and provides goal impact projections.

**Triggers:** New goal added • Payday • Weekly progress check
**Status:** 🟡 In Progress

## Income Tracker & Alerts

**Description:**
Monitors expected income deposits based on recurring income schedule. Alerts when payments are missing, delayed, or unexpected income received. Tracks monthly income totals against thresholds.

**Status:** 🟡 In Progress

## Lifestyle Impact Analysis

**Description:**
Models how small habit changes ("cut dining 20%", "brew coffee at home") accelerate savings goals. Shows annual savings potential and goal achievement timeline impact.

**Status:** 🟡 In Progress

## Bank Sync (foundation)

**Description:**
Universal bank transaction sync supporting multiple formats (Revolut, Wise, Monzo, Open Banking). Standardizes transaction data, deduplicates entries, and auto-categorizes incoming transactions.


**Status:** 🟢 Completed
# ISSUES / BLOCKERS

## Affiliate Integration Challenge

**Issue:**
May require revenue sharing agreements with retailers for affiliate links in shopping features.

**Impact:** Shopping features monetization
**Status:** 🔴 Blocked

## Bank Sync API Limitations

**Issue:**
Some banks have restricted API access or require additional authentication. Open Banking standards not yet universal across all financial institutions.

**Impact:** Financial automation features
**Status:** 🔴 Blocked
# FOR BUSINESS (Future Expansion)

## Team Collaboration Features

**Description:**
Shared expense tracking, team budgets, collaborative trip planning, and multi-user access controls.

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started
**Priority:** Future Release

## Technical Stack

**Automation:**
- n8n (Primary)
- Zapier (Email/Calendar features)

**AI/ML:**
- OpenAI GPT-4o / GPT-4o-mini
- GPT-4 Vision (Visual search)

**APIs & Services:**
- Google (Gmail, Calendar, Sheets, Drive)
- Slack (Notifications, approvals)
- TripAdvisor, Booking.com APIs
- Amazon, eBay product APIs
- Banking APIs (Open Banking)

**Database:**
- Supabase (planned)
- Google Sheets (current)

## Bound Flight Finder

**Description:**
Searches for round-trip flights based on origin, destination, dates, and passenger preferences.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier

## Recipe Search Assistant

**Description:**
Takes user input like "Find 3 healthy Italian recipes" and uses AI to generate tailored recipes with names, cooking time, ingredients, steps, and tips.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier

## Meal Planning Assistant

**Description:**
Creates weekly meal plans based on dietary preferences, budget constraints, and nutritional goals.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier

## Recurring Anomaly Detection

**Description:**
What it does: Spots duplicates, unusual spikes, new/hidden fees, or merchant changes.
Triggers: New transaction • Weekly scan.
Inputs: Last 90 days of categorized transactions.
Steps:

Rules: duplicate (same merchant/amount/date-window), spike vs. 30/90-day mean, new fee keywords.

Optional: LLM “reasonableness” check on outliers (short explanation).
Output: An “Anomalies” sheet + alert with top items and suggested actions (dispute/cancel/check).
Notes: Whitelist known once-a-year charges; tune thresholds per category.


**Status:** 🟢 Completed
# 1. EMAIL AND CALENDAR FEATURES

## Email Reply Assistant with Approval

**Description:**
Scans incoming emails, determines if a reply is needed, summarizes content with GPT, drafts a response, and sends it to Slack for user approval. Approved replies are sent via Gmail, while all actions are logged in Google Sheets.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 292770385
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/292770385

## Email Categorization & Priority Labeling

**Description:**
GPT labels emails as Urgent, To-Do, No Reply, Promotion, etc., applies Gmail labels, and logs categorization.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 292922321
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/292922321

## Calendar Scheduling & Conflict Detection From Incoming Emails

**Description:**
Detects scheduling intent in emails, adds events to Google Calendar, avoids double-booking, and suggests alternative times if conflicts arise.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 293520195
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/293520195

nodes.name: Calendar Scheduling & Conflict Detection From Incoming Emails1

parameters.content:
## Slack-Based Meeting Conflict Resolution (Needs Review)

**Description:**
Monitors Slack threads for user replies to scheduling conflicts. Parses replies, updates calendar accordingly, and logs outcomes.

**Status:** 🔴 Needs Review
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 293787097
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/293787097

## Handle Rescheduling Command (Slack to Gmail Reply)

**Description:**
Processes rescheduling requests via Slack to Gmail reply workflow, updates calendar events, and notifies relevant parties of schedule changes.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
https://zapier.com/editor/296172747/published?conversationId=b2bbc3c0-2068-47c9-b994-733a2d592249

nodes.name: Handle Rescheduling Command (Slack to Gmail Reply)1

parameters.content:
## Natural Language Calendar Control

**Description:**
Allows users to use natural voice/text commands ("Book meeting with Sarah next Tuesday 3pm") and AI interprets intent to create, reschedule, or block events in Google Calendar.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 294014555
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/294014555

## Handle Slack Reply for Missing Calendar Info

**Description:**
When calendar event creation is missing details, sends Slack prompt to user, captures response, and completes the calendar event with provided information.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
https://zapier.com/editor/294028040/published?conversationId=b2bbc3c0-2068-47c9-b994-733a2d592249

nodes.name: Handle Slack Reply for Missing Calendar Info1

parameters.content:
## Monthly Email Performance Reports

**Description:**
Provides analytics on email response times, categorization accuracy, and productivity metrics on a monthly basis.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Link:** https://zapier.com/editor/295894334/published?conversationId=b2bbc3c0-2068-47c9-b994-733a2d592249

## Weekly Email Performance Reports

**Description:**
Provides analytics on email response times, categorization accuracy, and productivity metrics (e.g., "Average response time: 3.2h, 87% of emails categorized correctly").

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 293870243
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/293870243

## Daily Email Reply & Calendar Event Reminder

**Description:**
Emails that are marked "Reply Needed" but not replied to within 24–48h trigger Slack or email reminders. Integrates with calendar to remind about upcoming events requiring follow-up.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 295692377
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/295692377

nodes.name: Daily Email Reply & Calendar Event Reminder1

parameters.content:
## Email Memory & Search Assistant

**Description:**
Allows users to type natural language queries (e.g., "What did Julia say about shipping last week?") and receive GPT summaries of matching recent email content. Useful for recalling discussions, tasks, or follow-ups.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 295894334
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/295894334

## Calendar Memory & Search Assistant

**Description:**
Allows users to type natural language queries (e.g., "When is my meeting with Robert?") and receive GPT summaries, relevant results. Useful for searching upcoming meetings or tasks.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 295934195
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/295934195

## Youtube Log

**Description:**
Gathers relevant videos from user-selected YouTube channels and includes them in a daily digest email. Powers the "YouTube" option in the app's social summary feature, enabling users to receive daily digests of the latest uploads from selected sources.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n
**Link:** https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SdMdFB2CnwEbEWb5IT6TBvZJiiDPFSex/view?usp=sharing

## Instagram Log

**Description:**
Captures Instagram posts from selected accounts for inclusion in daily summaries.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Topic Tracker – Keyword-Based News Log

**Description:**
Users specify specific topics or keywords (e.g., "AI", "Ukraine", "Bitcoin"), and the app automatically finds the most relevant and recent articles about that topic. Tracks specific keywords across news sources.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n
**Link:** https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hwOuyyjY1csNfKLoBBClLyfoLVf55CjF/view?usp=sharing

## Topic Tracker – Keyword-Based News Summary Email Sender

**Description:**
Powers the "Topic Tracker" feature in the app. Delivers a daily email digest summarizing the latest and most relevant news for each topic the user is following (e.g., Artificial Intelligence, Bitcoin, Climate Change).

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

nodes.name: Topic Tracker – Keyword-Based News Summary Email Sender

parameters.content:
## Default Platforms Summary Email Sender

**Description:**
Schedules and rotates email delivery for default social media platform summaries on a set schedule. Sends daily digests of content from selected platforms.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Youtube Video Summary (In progress)

**Description:**
Generates AI-powered summaries of YouTube videos for quick consumption without watching the full content.

**Status:** 🟡 In Progress
**Implementation:** n8n

## Facebook Log

**Description:**
Captures content from selected Facebook accounts and pages for inclusion in daily summaries.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Twitter Log

**Description:**
Captures tweets from selected Twitter/X accounts for inclusion in daily summaries.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Reddit Log

**Description:**
Ensures relevant Reddit posts are included in the user's daily news briefing email based on selected interests and subreddits.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Medium Log

**Description:**
Captures articles from selected Medium publications and writers for inclusion in daily summaries.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** n8n

## Daily Briefings & Summaries

**Description:**
Every morning, sends a GPT-generated overview of yesterday's key emails, today's events, and pending replies via Slack or email.

**Status:** 🟢 Completed
**Implementation:** Zapier
**Zapier ID:** 294648541
**Link:** https://zapier.com/app/editor/294648541

## Package Tracker (Order & Shipment Memory)

**Description:**
Turns every order‑confirmation e‑mail into a live parcel timeline with delay alerts.

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started

## Price Alerts (Watch List)

**Description:**
User pastes product URLs; workflow scrapes daily via Bright Data, stores current vs target price, and fires a mobile/e‑mail alert when price ≤ target. Expandable list shows thumbnail, store logos and 30‑day price sparkline.

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started

https://n8n.io/workflows/5223-sneaker-price-drop-alerts-with-bright-data-and-n8n/?utm_source=chatgpt.com

## Core Financial Management 

Automate the backbone of money tracking, budgeting, and cash flow planning.

## Enterprise Integrations

**Description:**
Integrations with accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero), CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot), and enterprise calendar systems.

**Status:** 🔴 Not Started
**Priority:** Future Release

## Risk & Error Protection

Safeguard user against leaks, fraud, and anomalies.

## Motivation & Goal Progress

Encourage financial health with gamified insights.

## Productivity Add-ons

Expand financial assistant beyond core money tasks.

## APIs & Add-ons Needed - Banking Data APIs 

Plaid / SaltEdge / Nordigen / Tink (region-dependent).
# Additional Features

## PERSONALIZATION - User Language Style Learner

**Description:**
Drafts/replies in their voice; warns on risky/harsh tone before sending. Big trust booster vs generic AI.



Pull 200–500 sent emails → build few-shot style profile (no full fine-tune needed). n8n: Gmail → OpenAI embeddings/prompts → store “style traits” in Supabase; pre-send “tone check” node.



**Status:** 🔴 Not Started

## PRIVACY - Private Mode (Sensitive Docs & Chat Scope)

**Description:**
Processes sensitive items (Contracts/Legal, HR, Finance/Bills, IDs/PII, Medical) without sending raw content to external AI. Users choose what’s private and what the assistant may reference in chat.



What it does (benefit):

Keeps confidential docs off third-party LLMs; prevents accidental sharing.

Still delivers summaries, action items, reminders—just privately.

Lets users decide per item/category if it can be used in chat memory.


**Status:** 🔴 Not Started

## FILE MANAGER - PDF Reader – Smart Analysis & Action

**Description:**
Uploads PDF/DOCX/TXT → extracts full text → GPT‑4o returns executive summary, key terms, actions needed, and any due dates.
Automatically saves the summary to Notes, sets calendar events or reminders for deadlines (“sign by 28 Aug”), and creates Promise‑Tracker items like Signature Required. Users can open the doc, add a reminder, push to calendar, or send the analysis—all from the Read File tab.


**Status:** 🔴 Not Started
